intensity.description: Intensity of the effect. Number between 0 and 255.
intensity.name: Effect intensity

palette.description: Name or ID of the WLED light palette.
palette.name: Colour palette

reverse.description: Reverse the effect. Either true to reverse or false otherwise.
reverse.name: Reverse effect

preset.description: Sets a preset for the WLED device.
preset.name: Set preset (deprecated)
